content.content: Just landed in NYC. Japan was a wild ride - learned a ton about managing projects across cultures. Now, I'm ready to hit the ground running here, but first, finding a good coffee spot. 🚀☕
content.raw_content: 🚀 Exciting times ahead as I transition from Japan to NYC! 🌉 My time in Japan has honed my skills in **international project management** and **cross-cultural communication**. As I step into the NYC job market, I'm eager to leverage these experiences while navigating new opportunities with a mix of excitement and uncertainty. 💼 #CareerJourney #NYC #JapanExperience
